title: 17-Year-Old Shot Near Univ. of Memphis Campus
content:
MEMPHIS, TN -(localmemphis.com)
Police are looking for a gunman who shot a teen has been shot near the University of Memphis campus Saturday.
MPD said the shooting happened in the 800 block of S. Graham Street around 7:30 p.m.
The victim, 17, was transported to Regional One Hospital in non-critical condition.
Authorities have said the suspect was last seen in a black Mustang
Police have no one in custody at this time. This is an ongoing investigation.
